新手常見問題：

Q1：洗唔洗刷首抽？
A1：請先自己做下功課，睇吓自己想玩咩deck。唔同deck有唔同首抽玩法
For example:
墮天使：可以先係Valhalla Calling 刷出一張key card -墮天使的放逐。之後，再講慢慢儲其他Key cards。

詳細情形可以留言問下一眾巴打

Q2：遊戲王點玩架？
Q2：官方公式規則書https://img.yugioh-card.com/sg/howto/cn-t/master_rule_2.pdf
其實玩玩下就識

Q3：新手抽邊個卡包好？
A3：請先自己做下功課，睇吓自己想玩咩deck。

Q4：幾時reset 卡盒？
A4：抽完你自己的目標卡之後就可以即刻Reset。

Q5：咩嘢係黃金包？
A5：過往卡包的汎用卡合集的卡包，必定會出現UR/ SR。期間限定出現。用免費石會有limit 次數 (6-10)。個人強烈不建議抽。
如果真的需要之前的卡包的卡，可以等最新型的優惠活動：卡包半價 。(10/25/2019 第一次開始，第一彈到第七彈大細卡包）
可以用比黃金包更少價錢得到想要的卡。

Q6：咩嘢係計數物陷阱？
A6：其實是反制陷阱的意思。有部份中文翻譯極度奇怪，有唔明的地方可以上黎問各位巴打。

Q7：點解duel links 無xyz, Pendulum 同Link架？
A7：Duel links 暫時開放到5ds，所以最新的召喚法是同步召喚。

Q8：點解我無GX, 5ds 同 Dsod 世界架？
A8：開新世界是取決你DM(初始)世界的Lv。基本上DM世界升到十級就可以開齊現有的GX, 5ds同Dsod。

Q9：點解d角色的Level 上限唔一樣架？
A9：角色的Level是取決於唔同的世界。DM同GX人物目前最高是45lv，5ds是35lv，而Dsod是30lv。

Q10：點樣可以得到石頭抽卡呀？
A10：
1. 營運贈送（如：活動紀念，開新卡包⋯etc）
2. 升級世界
3. 升級人物
4. 參加活動
5. 參加階段決鬥（其他tcg game的天梯）
6. 每隔一段時間觸碰畫面內的設施可獲得數量1/3/5顆的石頭 （傳送門：噴水池、對戰競技場：街燈、商場：商店上方、決鬥專區：垃圾桶）
7. 決鬥專區的街頭決鬥重溫，每日一次，可以獲得5石

此外，角色持有石頭的數量的上限是9999。到達上限後獲得的石頭會自動傳送到贈禮盒，贈禮盒內的石頭最多只可存放30日，逾期就會自動消失！

Q11：點樣可以得到角色技能呀？
A11：
1. 提升角色等級
2. 完成成就任務
3. 活動贈送
4. 和傳奇決鬥者決鬥後隨機掉落
5. 階段決鬥 決鬥後隨機掉落
6. 使用技能抽籤和一部份道具與交易商隨機交換

Q12：點解要提升決鬥評分呀
A12：每場決鬥的決鬥評分會影響掉落物品的數量，每1000分會掉落一個物品，一場決鬥的掉落上限是八個物品
影響決鬥評分的項目可以參考：http://immortalnova.hatenablog.com/entry/2017/02/03/224854
一般而言，刷分卡組可以參考巴哈此篇的PvE部份 ：https://forum.gamer.com.tw/C.php?bsn=29618&snA=18081&tnum=1 （其他部份有些內容比較過時）

由於不同活動敵人的卡組也不同，刷分卡組以屆時活動出現後的情況為準。

Q13：點解有d卡片票卷有藍眼白龍封面嘅？
A13：有藍眼白龍封面嘅卡片票卷是Dream ticket。和一般卡片票卷最大的分別是Dream ticket可以換取卡包和SD的卡片 （一般卡片票卷只能換取活動卡片）
只會在營運有特別紀念活動時贈送，可以換到指定卡片上市時間前的所有該稀有度的卡片。
目前可以得到的分別是2UR dream tickets, 1SR ticket。
2週年UR dream ticket可以換取GAIA GENESIS和此卡包之前所有卡包和活動的UR卡
2週年SR dream ticket可以換取GAIA GENESIS和此卡包之前所有卡包和活動的SR卡
DSOD dream ticket可以換取GUARDIANS OF ROCK和此卡包之前所有卡包和活動的UR卡

replies.msg: 童年回憶啫出埋超變化之術

I am the player who purchased cards over 22000, and I have support this game with my enthusiasm and money during these 3 years. I want to recommend the more Fair and Efficient standard for the next Ban-List.

For the Ban-List about Characters’ Skill, I recommend to rebalance the skill about “Compensation” from the Characters - Yami Bakura & Yubel. The cost of activating the skill is extremely after using the card of Cosmic Cyclone, then almost players utilise the skill to match the system of Darklord. Normally, the players use the skill of “Compensation” to discard a card from the top of the Darklord-System deck to gain 300lp. Although it is need to be lucky to have the “Casting Out The Darklord” on the top of the deck, but almost players only place 3 Cosmic Cyclone with 17 cards about Darklord System, so it is not difficult to achieve. Also, if this card canbe sent to Graveyard, then the player can use the skill to return this card to the deck and to search for any card about Darklord System, almost are the Ban-List Cards “Altar of the Darklords” and “Darklord Divinity” to expand the Duel most quickly and easily. This is extremely unfair to another card system, please rebalance this Characters’ skill.

For the Ban-List about Cards, according to the card of “That Grass Looks Greener” can discard at least 8-10 cards from the deck when 30decks vs 20/21 decks, and almost players use this card with the system of “Shiranui”. When the “Shiranui Spectral Sword” was sent to the Graveyard easily by “That Grass Looks Greener”, the players can easily be “Synchro Summon” the powerful monsters by the effect of “Shiranui Spectral Sword” to expand the duel most quickly to one turn kill. So I recommend to restrict “That Grass Looks Greener” only be used the amount as 1.

Please consider my recommendation if it is attractive and helpful for the game-development.

quote.msg:
I am the player who purchased cards over 22000, and I have support this game with my enthusiasm and money during these 3 years. I want to recommend the more Fair and Efficient standard for the next Ban-List.

For the Ban-List about Characters’ Skill, I recommend to rebalance the skill about “Compensation” from the Characters - Yami Bakura & Yubel. The cost of activating the skill is extremely after using the card of Cosmic Cyclone, then almost players utilise the skill to match the system of Darklord. Normally, the players use the skill of “Compensation” to discard a card from the top of the Darklord-System deck to gain 300lp. Although it is need to be lucky to have the “Casting Out The Darklord” on the top of the deck, but almost players only place 3 Cosmic Cyclone with 17 cards about Darklord System, so it is not difficult to achieve. Also, if this card canbe sent to Graveyard, then the player can use the skill to return this card to the deck and to search for any card about Darklord System, almost are the Ban-List Cards “Altar of the Darklords” and “Darklord Divinity” to expand the Duel most quickly and easily. This is extremely unfair to another card system, please rebalance this Characters’ skill.

For the Ban-List about Cards, according to the card of “That Grass Looks Greener” can discard at least 8-10 cards from the deck when 30decks vs 20/21 decks, and almost players use this card with the system of “Shiranui”. When the “Shiranui Spectral Sword” was sent to the Graveyard easily by “That Grass Looks Greener”, the players can easily be “Synchro Summon” the powerful monsters by the effect of “Shiranui Spectral Sword” to expand the duel most quickly to one turn kill. So I recommend to restrict “That Grass Looks Greener” only be used the amount as 1.

Please consider my recommendation if it is attractive and helpful for the game-development.

另外，我覺得唔同用法 ，暴風反而最有用係 當對手場上有啲高攻怪係唔受卡效target 可以用暴風玩謝佢。

replies.msg:
舊舊制慢過龜
Set犀鬥，後場落神宣、和睦、聖防之類嘅卡，就咁完turn
好運嘅咪稜鏡，鳥鬥落墓，早葬/死蘇召鳥鬥，召凱撒
或者出任一劍鬥，奴隸虎，召大流士，墓地有鳥鬥就拉佢上嚟召凱撒
或者訓練所拎繩鬥上手，打，召魚鬥/鳥鬥炸場，然後set後場完turn
舊制無論打主流定裝備型訓練所都幾重要，唔會虧hand

新制有啲複雜，都係睇人玩
好似係
救援兔>白板>獵豹>總監>希拉克略/新嗰張九星定場
或者獵豹>奧古斯都/大流士之類可以特召嘅怪然後再展開

結論：劍鬥獸無前途但我會照課
